title: Chaos
description: What would you do if you were turned into a Vampire? Laynie meets a mysterious guy while out one night. He seems so easy for her to talk to, but he was far from harmless. Now she has turned and a new world awaits, but is he the person that she believes he is? Love sparks and bonds grow. Lies are hard to cover up when the most powerful witch in the world is searching for the man that she loves. Laynie soon discovers that her whole life has been something other than she had thought. She has a birthright, but can she accept the truth that she finds?
author: April Margeson
